thread.section_title: HGU New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel
thread.title_full: Nice hotel - Review of HGU New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Andre G
title: Nice hotel
text:
We choosed this hotel because of its location; there is a subway station nearby where passes the 6 line. Its located midtown, next to some of the principal touristic sites and, with the proximity to the subway, we could get anywhere.
The staff are great; there room are confortable and very clean. The restaurant is a little bit expensive, but the food and wines are good.
